newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - May 21.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - May 21.

text.p: Following is a summary of major political and business stories in local newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Shanghai. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy.

- SHANGHAI SECURITIES NEWS - The Shenzhen stock exchange is to suspend trading in the shares of Shenzhen Universe Industrial Stock Corporation on Wednesday morning for alleged institutional irregularities including price manipulation.
- The Shanghai stock exchange is improving its computerised system with the aim of more effectively monitoring trading to strengthen market supervision.
- Officials at the State Statistics Bureau predict no rebound in China's inflation this year.
- BUSINESS NEWS - Shanghai companies must reconstruct their assets with profits falling even as turnover has increased in the past few years.
- Commentary says U.S. extension of China's MFN status is not something bestowed on China, but in its own best interests.
